name: Mekansm
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

descriptions.name: Restore
descriptions.description: Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.

descriptions.name: Mekansm Aura
descriptions.description: Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.
